Jun 1, 2002

Operation Enduring Payouts

“No one has yet snagged the Bush administration’s $25-million “dead or alive” bounty on Bin Laden. But a senior intelligence official in Washington says America’s spy service has distributed “tens of millions of dollars” in cash since last fall in the effort to find him, as well as in other covert operations.” (Afgha.com)
